admin_page.title: Admin Portal
admin_page.description: Manage website content and view analytics.

manage_vehicles.title: Manage Vehicles
manage_vehicles.description: Add, edit, or remove vehicles from the catalog.

manage_users.title: Manage Users
manage_users.description: View the list of registered users and manage their roles.

manage_leads.title: Client Leads
manage_leads.description: Manage customers interested in vehicles from auctions and SUM Trading.

view_analytics.title: Site Analytics
view_analytics.description: View statistics on visits, sales, and popular searches.

add_vehicle_page.title: Add New Vehicle
add_vehicle_page.description: Fill in the details of the new vehicle to add it to the catalog.

fields.isFeatured_desc: Featured vehicles will appear on the homepage.
fields.vin_description: The VIN will be decoded automatically after you finish typing.
fields.hasKeys_desc: Indicates if the vehicle comes with keys.
fields.internalNotes_desc: These notes will not be visible to clients.

placeholders.highlights: e.g., Run and Drive, Low mileage
placeholders.description: Describe the vehicle or let AI do it for you...
placeholders.damageDescription: e.g., Minor dent on front bumper
placeholders.internalNotes: e.g., Client interested, check before sale...

vin_modal.title: NHTSA API Data
vin_modal.description: This is the raw response received from the server for the provided VIN.

edit_vehicle_page.title: Edit Vehicle
edit_vehicle_page.description: Update the details of the vehicle.
edit_vehicle_page.not_found_desc: Could not find the vehicle you are looking for.

delete_vehicle_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_vehicle_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the vehicle {make} {model} and its associated files.
delete_vehicle_dialog.delete_error_desc: There was a problem deleting the vehicle. Please try again.

admin_header.logout_success_desc: You have been logged out successfully.
admin_header.logout_error_desc: Could not log out. Please try again.

admin_layout.access_denied_desc: You do not have permission to access this section.

admin_register_page.title: Create New Admin User
admin_register_page.description: This form creates a user with administrator privileges.
admin_register_page.success_desc: The new administrator account has been created successfully.

admin_vehicles_page.delete_many_desc: This will permanently delete {count} vehicles and all their associated files.
admin_vehicles_page.status_update_success_desc: The status of {make} {model} has been updated to {status}.
admin_vehicles_page.status_update_error_desc: Could not update vehicle status. Please try again.

admin_users_page.fetch_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while fetching users.
admin_users_page.fetch_error_desc: There was a problem retrieving the list of users.
admin_users_page.role_change_error_self: You cannot change your own role.
admin_users_page.role_change_success_desc: The role for {email} has been changed to {role}.
admin_users_page.delete_error_self: You cannot delete your own account from this panel.

dialog_role.title: Confirm Role Change
dialog_role.description: Are you sure you want to change the role of {email} to {role}?

dialog_delete.title: Confirm Deletion
dialog_delete.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {count} user(s)? This action cannot be undone.

admin_analytics_page.title: Site Analytics
admin_analytics_page.description: View live data from Microsoft Clarity.

admin_leads_page.title: Client Leads
admin_leads_page.description: Manage customers who have requested consultation for auction and SUM Trading vehicles.
admin_leads_page.whatsapp_message_copart: Hello {name}, I'm contacting you from SUM Trading regarding your consultation request for Copart vehicles.
admin_leads_page.whatsapp_message_sum: Hello {name}, I'm contacting you from SUM Trading regarding your interest in our vehicles.

admin_storage_test.title: Server Auth Test
admin_storage_test.description: This page helps verify that server-side actions are properly authenticated using session cookies.
admin_storage_test.step1_desc: Step 1: Click the button below to get your user's auth token and create a secure session cookie on the server-side. This simulates the login process and authorizes your browser to make secure requests.
admin_storage_test.step2_desc: Step 2: Now that you are authenticated with the server, you should be able to fetch data from protected endpoints. Click the button below to get all users.
admin_storage_test.login_required: You must be logged in to perform this action.
admin_storage_test.token_verified_desc: Your browser is now authenticated with the server.
admin_storage_test.verification_error_desc: Could not verify claims or create session.
admin_storage_test.permission_denied: You do not have permission to perform this action.
admin_storage_test.fetch_users_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while fetching users.
admin_storage_test.no_admin_role: Your account does not have the 'admin' role in its claims.
